price: Он гоҳ гурӯҳи дигареро пас аз онон падид овардем
arabic: ثُمَّ أَنشَأۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَرِينَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma anshanā min baʿdihim qarnan ākharīna
